thread.title: BRIEF-Citic Telecom International Posts FY Profit Attributable Of HK$‍881.3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Citic Telecom International Posts FY Profit Attributable Of HK$‍881.3 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - citic telecom international holdings ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Citic Telecom International Holdings Ltd :
* FY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO EQUITY SHAREHOLDERS OF CO HK$‍881.3 MILLION VERSUS HK$850.1 MILLION
* ‍FY TOTAL REVENUE AMOUNTED TO HK$7,450.8 MILLION, REPRESENTING A DECLINE OF 3.2%​
* ‍BOARD RECOMMENDED A FINAL DIVIDEND OF HK13.00 CENTS PER SHARE FOR 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
